a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of people that think others can be trusted vs. taken
– The y-axis shows the share of respondents that agree with the statement “most people can be trusted.”
– The x-axis shows the share that agree with the statement “most people would try to take advantage of you if they
Share agreeing "most people would try to take advantage of you"
Share agreeing "most people can be trusted"
Note: We include the most recent data available for both questions. In most countries this corresponds to WVS wave 4, 2000-2004.
